Merit Awards Ceremony

Merit Awards Ceremony

Monday September 16 - 07:00 PM to 08:00 PM

Finley Community Center, 2060 West College Avenue, Santa Rosa

Since 1978, the Santa Rosa City Council has presented Merit Awards to individuals, organizations and businesses who volunteer their time and energies to serve the community and improve the quality of life in Santa Rosa.

Tuesday September 17 - 06:30 PM to 07:00 PM

None

CNPS Milo Baker Chapter Speaker 'The Importance of Urban Wildland, Local Biodiversity and Parks'

CNPS Milo Baker Chapter Speaker 'The Importance of Urban Wildland, Local Biodiversity and Parks'

Tuesday September 17 - 07:30 PM to 09:00 PM

Luther Burbank Art & Garden, 2050 Yulupa Avenue, Santa Rosa

A hybrid meeting showcasing the efforts to preserve an urban woodland in Santa Rosa for exploration and education in a wild setting. The 20 acre property has a creek and a oak woodland near a local elementary school.. The speakers are passionate about the opportunities for the neighborhood.

Mayflower Hall, 5311 O'Donnell Lane, Glen Ellen
